PHRASE.LANG: Novus Prime recruits can finally enjoy some rest between battles thanks to this latest breakthrough in Nebulon-powered hovering furniture. Simply activate the touchscreen on your armrest to float through PlayStation®Home in unparalleled comfort. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]

Les recrues Novus Prime peuvent enfin apprécier un peu de repos entre les combats grâce à ce tout nouveau meuble volant à l'énergie Nébulon. Activez simplement l'écran tactile sur l'accoudoir pour flotter à travers PlayStation®Home dans un confort inégalé. L'amplificateur de vitesse est enclenché quand l'avatar se déplace à sa vitesse maximale. [#Legal]

Rekruten von Novus Prime können sich dank diesem Durchbruch in Sachen nebulonbetriebenen Schwebemöbeln endlich zwischen den Gefechten mal eine Pause gönnen. Aktiviere einfach den Touchscreen in der Armlehne und schwebe durch PlayStation®Home, während du unvergleichlichen Komfort genießt. Der Geschwindigkeitsschub setzt automatisch ein, wenn der Avatar sich mit voller Geschwindigkeit bewegt. [#Legal]

Le reclute Novus Prime possono finalmente godersi un po' di meritato riposo dalle battaglie grazie a quest'ultima innovazione futuristica partorita dalla mente dei Nebulon. Basta attivare il touch screen sul bracciolo per librarsi in volo attraverso PlayStation®Home in tutta comodità. È possibile incrementarne la velocità portando l'avatar alla sua massima velocità di spostamento. [#Legal]

Los reclutas de Novus Prime pueden finalmente disfrutar de un poco de descanso entre las batallas gracias a este último avance en muebles flotantes impulsados por Nebulon. Simplemente activa la pantalla táctil de tu reposabrazos para flotar por PlayStation®Home con una comodidad sin precedentes. El aumento de velocidad se activa cuando el avatar se está moviendo a su máxima velocidad. [#Legal]

Novus Prime recruits can finally enjoy some rest between battles thanks to this latest breakthrough in Nebulon-powered hovering furniture. Simply activate the touchscreen on your armrest to float through PlayStation®Home in unparalleled comfort. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]

Novus Prime recruits can finally enjoy some rest between battles thanks to this latest breakthrough in Nebulon-powered hovering furniture. Simply activate the touchscreen on your armrest to float through PlayStation®Home in unparalleled comfort. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]
